item.title: How to change Co-Owner to Owner
item.dc:creator: @The_Provoked The Provoked
item.description:
@The_Provoked wrote:

Ok, if you have a server problem like me, and you set your player rights to 3 and it says you’re Co-Owner, then here’s the solution!!

Ok, go to your Source and go to the client.java and search “playerrights” and keep searching for a place where it says:

if (playerRights == 3) {
titles = "[Co-Owner] ";
}

then change it to:

if (playerRights == 3) {
titles = "[Owner] ";
}

and there you have it!! you are now the owner of your server!!

Read full topic
item.source: How to change Co-Owner to Owner
